H0.text: branch of science that deals with the structure of human body parts. Histology

H1.text: branch of science that deals with the structure of human body parts. Physiology

H2.text: branch of science that deals with the structure of human body parts. Embryology

H3.text: branch of science that deals with the structure of human body parts. Anatomy

A4.text: The term 'anatomy' is commonly taken to refer to human anatomy.

A5.text: Anatomy is quite distinct from physiology and biochemistry, which deal respectively with the functions of those parts and the chemical processes involved.
